mapper.select: SELECT MRI.MGMT_SEQ ,MRI.POL_NM ,MRI.POL_CD ,MRI.POL_DISTRICT ,MRI.ROUTE_CD ,MRI.ROUTE_NM ,MRI.LIGHT_NO1 ,MRI.LIGHT_NO2 ,MRI.LIGHT_NO3 ,INSTALL_DATE ,MRI.CROSSROAD_CD ,MRI.CROSSROAD_NM ,MRI.INSTALL_ADDR_DTL1 ,MRI.INSTALL_ADDR_DTL2 ,MRI.INSTALL_ADDR_DTL3 ,MRI.INSTALL_ADDR_DTL4 ,MRI.INSTALL_ADDR_DTL5 ,MRI.INSTALL_ADDR_DTL6 ,MRI.TYPE_CONTROLL ,MRI.TYPE_ROAD ,MRI.LAT ,MRI.LNG ,MRI.REG_USERID ,MRI.REG_DATE FROM MGMT_REG_INSTALL MRI WHERE MRI.DEL_DATE IS NULL AND MRI.MGMT_SEQ = #{mgmtSeq}

SELECT MRC.MGMT_SEQ ,MRC.SIGNAL_RULES ,MRC.SIGNAL_WIRING ,MRC.UPS_TYPE ,MRC.UPS_BAT_EXCHANGE_DATE ,MRC.CONSTRUCTOR_SIGNAL1 ,MRC.CONSTRUCTOR_SIGNAL2 ,MRC.CONSTRUCTOR_CTRL1 ,MRC.CONSTRUCTOR_CTRL2 ,MRC.CONSTRUCTOR_ENG1 ,MRC.CONSTRUCTOR_ENG2 ,MRC.CONSTRUCTION_EXPENSES FROM MGMT_REG_CONSTRUCTION MRC WHERE MRC.MGMT_SEQ = #{mgmtSeq}

SELECT MRTL.MGMT_SEQ ,MRTL.KIND_TRAFFIC_LIGHT1 ,MRTL.KIND_TRAFFIC_LIGHT2 ,MRTL.KIND_TRAFFIC_LIGHT3 ,MRTL.KIND_TRAFFIC_LIGHT4 ,MRTL.KIND_TRAFFIC_LIGHT5 ,MRTL.KIND_TRAFFIC_LIGHT6 ,MRTL.KIND_TRAFFIC_LIGHT7 ,MRTL.KIND_TRAFFIC_LIGHT8 ,MRTL.KIND_TRAFFIC_LIGHT9 ,MRTL.KIND_TRAFFIC_LIGHT10 ,MRTL.KIND_TRAFFIC_LIGHT11 ,MRTL.KIND_TRAFFIC_LIGHT12 ,MRTL.KIND_TRAFFIC_LIGHT13 ,MRTL.KIND_TRAFFIC_LIGHT14 ,MRTL.KIND_TRAFFIC_LIGHT15 ,MRTL.KIND_TRAFFIC_LIGHT16 ,MRTL.KIND_LAMP_WARNING1 ,MRTL.KIND_LAMP_WARNING2 ,MRTL.KIND_LAMP_WARNING3 ,MRTL.KIND_LAMP_WARNING4 ,MRTL.KIND_LAMP_WARNING5 ,MRTL.KIND_LAMP_WARNING6 ,MRTL.KIND_LAMP_WARNING7 ,MRTL.KIND_LAMP_WARNING8 ,MRTL.KIND_LAMP_WARNING9 ,MRTL.KIND_LAMP_WARNING10 ,MRTL.KIND_LAMP_WARNING11 ,MRTL.KIND_LAMP_WARNING12 ,MRTL.KIND_LAMP_VARIABLE1 ,MRTL.KIND_LAMP_VARIABLE2 ,MRTL.KIND_LAMP_VARIABLE3 ,MRTL.KIND_LAMP_VARIABLE4 ,MRTL.KIND_LAMP_VARIABLE5 ,MRTL.KIND_LAMP_VARIABLE6 ,MRTL.KIND_LAMP_VARIABLE7 ,MRTL.KIND_LAMP_VARIABLE8 ,MRTL.KIND_LAMP_VARIABLE9 ,MRTL.KIND_LAMP_VARIABLE10 ,MRTL.KIND_LAMP_VARIABLE11 ,MRTL.KIND_LAMP_VARIABLE12 ,MRTL.KIND_LAMP_WALKING1 ,MRTL.KIND_LAMP_WALKING2 ,MRTL.KIND_LAMP_WALKING3 ,MRTL.KIND_LAMP_WALKING4 ,MRTL.KIND_LAMP_WALKING5 ,MRTL.KIND_LAMP_WALKING6 ,MRTL.KIND_LAMP_WALKING7 ,MRTL.KIND_LAMP_WALKING8 ,MRTL.KIND_LAMP_WALKING9 ,MRTL.KIND_LAMP_WALKING10 ,MRTL.KIND_LAMP_WALKING11 ,MRTL.KIND_LAMP_WALKING12 FROM MGMT_REG_TRAFFIC_LIGHT MRTL WHERE MRTL.MGMT_SEQ = #{mgmtSeq}

SELECT MRP.MGMT_SEQ ,MRP.PILLAR_VEHICLE_LAMP1 ,MRP.PILLAR_VEHICLE_LAMP2 ,MRP.PILLAR_VEHICLE_LAMP3 ,MRP.PILLAR_VEHICLE_LAMP4 ,MRP.PILLAR_VEHICLE_LAMP5 ,MRP.PILLAR_WALKING_LAMP1 ,MRP.PILLAR_WALKING_LAMP2 ,MRP.PILLAR_TRAFFIC_LIGHT1 ,MRP.PILLAR_TRAFFIC_LIGHT2 ,MRP.PILLAR_TRAFFIC_LIGHT3 ,MRP.PILLAR_TRAFFIC_LIGHT4 ,MRP.PILLAR_TRAFFIC_LIGHT5 ,MRP.PILLAR_INTEGRATION1 ,MRP.PILLAR_INTEGRATION2 ,MRP.ATTACH_ETC1 ,MRP.ATTACH_ETC2 FROM MGMT_REG_PILLAR MRP WHERE MRP.MGMT_SEQ = #{mgmtSeq}

SELECT MRC.MGMT_SEQ ,MRC.CTRL_ELECTRON ,MRC.CTRL_CYCLE ,MRC.CTRL_SENSITIVE ,MRC.SIGNAL_CYCLE1 ,MRC.SIGNAL_CYCLE2 ,MRC.SIGNAL_CYCLE3 ,MRC.SIGNAL_CYCLE4 ,MRC.SIGNAL_CYCLE5 ,MRC.SIGNAL_CYCLE6 ,MRC.SIGNAL_SEC1 ,MRC.SIGNAL_SEC2 ,MRC.SIGNAL_SEC3 ,MRC.SIGNAL_SEC4 ,MRC.SIGNAL_SEC5 ,MRC.SIGNAL_SEC6 ,MRC.SIGNAL_SEC_TOT ,MRC.CURRENT_SEL_TIME1 ,MRC.CURRENT_SEL_TIME2 ,MRC.CURRENT_SEL_TIME3 ,MRC.CURRENT_SEL_TIME4 ,MRC.CURRENT_SEL_TIME5 ,MRC.CURRENT_SEL_TIME6 ,MRC.CURRENT_SEL_TIME7 ,MRC.CURRENT_TIME1 ,MRC.CURRENT_TIME2 ,MRC.CURRENT_TIME3 ,MRC.CURRENT_TIME4 ,MRC.CURRENT_TIME5 ,MRC.CURRENT_TIME6 ,MRC.CURRENT_TIME7 ,MRC.SIGNAL_YELLOW1 ,MRC.SIGNAL_YELLOW2 ,MRC.SIGNAL_YELLOW3 ,MRC.SIGNAL_YELLOW4 ,MRC.SIGNAL_YELLOW5 ,MRC.SIGNAL_YELLOW6 ,MRC.SIGNAL_ALL_RED1 ,MRC.SIGNAL_ALL_RED2 ,MRC.SIGNAL_ALL_RED3 ,MRC.SIGNAL_ALL_RED4 ,MRC.SIGNAL_ALL_RED5 ,MRC.SIGNAL_ALL_RED6 ,MRC.SIGNAL_CROSSWALK1 ,MRC.SIGNAL_CROSSWALK2 ,MRC.SIGNAL_CROSSWALK3 ,MRC.SIGNAL_CROSSWALK4 ,MRC.SIGNAL_CROSSWALK5 ,MRC.SIGNAL_CROSSWALK6 FROM MGMT_REG_CONTROLLER MRC WHERE MRC.MGMT_SEQ = #{mgmtSeq}
